name: Capitalistic Chaos
description:
Survive the Chaos that is Capitalism! 

On the biggest shopping day of the year, you're running around and scrambling to buy the hottest goods before they sell out.

See how many items you can snag and how much money you can spend before time runs out.  Be careful though, some items sell out faster than others!!

Sounds by JDCViolin

3D Art, Character Rigging and Animation by Lowlande5k

Programming by NeoSkedar

Supermarket Scene from Unity Asset Store

Collectible Items from CGTrader free to use
